name: Toiper's Escape
description:
Help Toiper escape after his horrible discovery of what his one-time-use purpose is! Submission for GJL Game Parade Summer 2021 with a theme of 'One Time Use'

First submission (developed in one week) is downloadable.

Updated version (+3 days) is played in browser.

Additions since first submission: All code refactored. Audio implemented (still needs tuning in some places). All movement revamped. A lot of unused art assets implemented. Added animations. Revamped UI. Particles added.

Designed & developed by Radi Salamat - radidar.artstation.com - radidar19@yahoo.com

Art by Andrea Jovanovic - andreajovanovic.artstation.com - andrea.jovanovic@gmail.com

Audio by Raphamakemusic - raphamakemusic.itch.io - raphaelhidalgo3@gmail.com
